text: Alford is a town in Lincolnshire, England. It is about northwest of the coastal resort of Skegness, at the foot of the Lincolnshire Wolds, which form an Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty. The population was recorded as 3,459 in the 2011 census, and estimated at 3,789 in 2019. Category:Towns in Lincolnshire
title: Alford, Lincolnshire
